name: Endless Survivor
description: Endless Survivor is a rogue-like game where players must survive against endless waves of enemies. Scavenge for weapons, upgrade your skills and fend off the relentless horde to see how long you can survive. Each run is unique with randomly generated levels and enemies, providing a fresh and challenging experience every time you play. It's my first game, so please be understanding if there are any rough edges or bugs. My main goal was to create a fun and engaging game that offers a unique experience. Can you survive the Endless waves? give Endless Survivor a try!
